downloadDescription: Development tool for the HostFile, IMS and CICS Standard Connectors for Logic Apps
detailsSection: The HIS Designer for Logic Apps is a desktop application used to create .HIDX (Host Integration Designer XML) file, which is a XML representation of a COBOL copybook. This file is required by the HostFile, CICS and IMS Standard Logic Apps connectors.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2022, Windows 10, Windows 11

This release requires the following version of the Microsoft .NET Framework:

    Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Go.
2. Do one of the following: 
        o To start the installation immediately, click Run.
        o To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
        o To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
